description: This table contains hospital account transaction details from the Hospital Permanent Transactions (HTR) master file.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction.

columns.name: CONTEST_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the contested reason. This is set only for charges.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Account Has Contested Charges


Patient Not Seen


Bankruptcy


Legal


Deceased


Not Informed Service Not Covered


Service Not Provided


Insurance Appeal


Patient Grievance


Other

columns.name: CONTEST_RESOLUTION_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the contested resolution reason. This is set only for charges.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Transfer


All Charges Resolved


Contested in Error


Confirmed Billed Correctly


Patient No Longer Contesting


Insurance Issue Resolved


Problem Fixed

columns.name: REVERSAL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the reversal reason. This is set for all transaction types.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


CCI Edit


No Supporting Documentation


Service Not Performed


Payment Received


Returned Mail


Other


Duplicate


Posted in Error


Wrong Code


Give Back

columns.name: TAX_RATE_DEF_CSN
columns.description: This column stores the tax rate definition contact serial number (CSN) used in the tax calculation.

columns.name: IS_PRE_SERVICE_PMT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this is a pre-service payment, such as a co-pay. This item is only populated for self-pay payments A payment is considered pre-service if it is a visit pre-pay or co-pay payment (such as during check-in).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: FIRST_HTR_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the first hospital billing transaction in a chain of transactions. Note that this chain will include transactions from both hospital billing and professional billing, so this item will return the very first transaction. For a given transaction, either column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_HTR_ID, or column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_ETR_ID will be populated. This is different from column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.FIRST_TX_ID, which only chains back to the point that the transaction was transferred from professional billing.

columns.name: FIRST_ETR_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the first professional billing transaction (ETR record) in a chain of transactions. Note that this chain will include transactions from both hospital billing and professional billing, so this item will return the very first transaction. For a given transaction, either column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_HTR_ID, or column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_3.FIRST_ETR_ID will be populated. This is different from column HSP_TRANSACTIONS_2.FIRST_TX_ID, which only chains back to the point that the transaction was transferred from professional billing.

columns.name: NO_PAY_CLAIM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
If this charge was posted to drive no-pay claims to be generated, this charge is intended to file and bill immediately. These claims will have different types/purposes. This item defines the type of claim that should be generated for the bucket that hold this charge.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


SNF No-Pay Claim


SNF Exhaust Claim


HH No-Pay RAP


HH Notice of Admission

columns.name: ORIG_PMT_SPLIT_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the original unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction when payments are distributed or split.

columns.name: SVC_AUTH_ID
columns.description: This item stores the social care service decision level authorization record associated with this charge.

columns.name: POSTING_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department where the transaction was posted.

columns.name: TAX_EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date used in the hospital billing system definitions that determine when this tax line went into effect.

columns.name: TAXABLE_AMOUNT
columns.description: This item stores the amount that the tax is applied to

columns.name: TAX_PERCENT
columns.description: Percent used to calculate the tax amount

columns.name: TAX_AMOUNT
columns.description: This item stores the amount used for the tax

columns.name: DIGITAL_WALLET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the digital wallet used for an electronic payment. Stored on payments made from a digital wallet and on reversals. This item is not stored on refund transactions.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Apple Pay


Google Pay

columns.name: ADV_BILL_DB_TX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital billing transaction for this advance bill debit transfer adjustment.

columns.name: ADV_BILL_ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the estimate used in posting this advance bill adjustment.

columns.name: IS_ADV_BILL_TRANS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if this transaction an advance bill transfer system adjustment. Includes both credit and debit adjustments.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_PRE_SERVICE_PMT_YN

columns.name: SAVED_PMT_DIGITAL_WALLET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the digital wallet of the saved payment method used to make the payment


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DIGITAL_WALLET_C_NAME

columns.name: RESEARCH_ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study association linked to this transaction.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The payment's claim print ID with a matching invoice number.

columns.name: INS_WRITE_OFF_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the insurance write off amount from the payment based on remittance codes that are mapped to an insurance write-off action.

columns.name: IS_SCANNED_CHECK_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a transaction was made using a scanned check.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_PRE_SERVICE_PMT_YN

columns.name: E_PMT_RECEIPT_MSG
columns.description: Saves the receipt message received from the gateway for an electronic payment transaction.

columns.name: PAT_PMT_COLL_WKFL_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the workflow category ID performed to collect a patient payment from the point of view of the user. For example, MyChart eCheck-in vs. MyChart One-Touch.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Staff Collected


MyChart Billing


MyChart One-Touch


MyChart Pay as Guest


MyChart Visit Payment


MyChart eCheck-in


Welcome Balance Payment


Welcome Check-in


Two-Way SMS


Payment Posting


Lockbox


Release of Information


Willow Ambulatory


Web Service

columns.name: MYC_SIGNIN_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column denotes how the patient or guarantor logged in to MyChart to either post the payment or create an agreement that will post a payment via Auto Pay. Only populated for agreements made via MyChart.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Password Sign-in


Demographics Sign-in


No Sign-in

columns.name: POSTING_MYPT_ID
columns.description: This column contains either the MyChart account that created the agreement that resulted in the self-pay payment (if applicable) or the MyChart account that posted the self-pay payment.

columns.name: POSTING_MYC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains either the status of the MyChart account that created the agreement that resulted in the self-pay payment (if applicable) or the status of the MyChart account that posted the self-pay payment.  An active MyChart account status is defined as whether a MyChart user could log into the account with a user name and password. Accounts that are not yet active, deactivated, or are proxy accounts are considered inactive.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


ACTIVE


INACTIVE

columns.name: EB_TX_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the enterprise posting module for the transaction. This is calculated based on the hospital billing transaction source for the transaction. For reversals, the module will always match the module of the reversed parent transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Payment Plan Auto Pay


Enterprise Payment Posting


HB Payment Posting


PB Payment Posting


Electronic Remittance


PB Charge Entry Fast Pay


POS Quick Pay


Welcome


MyChart Web


PB Release of Information


Transaction Import


Web Service


Payment Collection


Willow Ambulatory


Distribution


Transfer from PB


Transfer from HB


MyChart Mobile


Guest Pay


Account Maintenance Refund


Patient Refund


Back-End Refund


Visit Auto Pay


Trust Recurring Payment


Premium Billing Auto Pay


Premium Billing One Time Payment


Premium Billing Payment Posting


Two-Way SMS


External Agency Payment
